1: When mother was younger, we visited her friends.
2: She took me to the market to buy vegetables.
3: She took my brother to town.
4: She taught me the names of plants.
5: When mother grew older, her back bent.
6: She stayed home more and talked to our neighbour's children.
9: Her grandchildren went to visit her during holiday time.
10: Neighbours brought her milk from the shop.
11: When mother was younger, she was stronger.
12: Now, mother is older, she is weaker.
